title: Eerie 1-3 (2012-2013) (Digital) (Nahga-Empire) (Ongoing)
description:
English | CBR | 3 Issues

Eerie #1-3
Publisher: Dark Horse
Publication Date: July 11, 2012, January 9, 2013, and July 10, 2013

Writers:  Daniel Lapham, Bill Dubay, Christopher A. Taylor, and Bruce Jones (#1), Damon Gentry, Brian Clevinger, and Archie Goodwin (#2), and Landry Q. Walker, Jonathan Case, and Gerry Boudreau (#3)
Artists:  Daniel Lapham, Bill Dubay, Rafa Carres, and Richard Corben (#1), Mike Allred, Evan Shaner, and Gene Colan (#2), and Troy Nixey, Jonathan Case, and Wally Wood (#3)
Letterer:  Nate Piekos
Cover Artist:  Jim Pavelec

Eerie #1
Uncle Creepy's been having all the fun in Dark Horse's revival of classic Warren magazines, so now it's Cousin Eerie's turn! The terrifying treasury of sinister sci-fi and fearsome fantasy returns with two all-new stories to thrill and chill, plus a classic reprint! First up is a dose of robotic paranoia from red-hot writer/artist David Lapham, followed by way-too-close encounters from Creepy veteran Christopher Taylor! Your trip to the comics store is about to get a lot more horrifying!

Eerie #2
Eerie returns with two new tales of science gone amok, plus a classic from the dungeon! Mike Allred (iZombie, Madman) embellishes Damon Gentry's ("The Horror Robber") tale of communication breakdown between us and "Our Friend the Ant," while Brian Clevinger (Atomic Robo) warns of aliens' most insidious invasion plan yet!

Eerie #3
Cousin Eerie knows what you crave-all the scares your voracious brain can handle! That's why his latest terror tome brings you ravenous aliens from Landry Walker (Danger Club) and Troy Nixey (Jenny Finn: Doom Messiah) and insatiable infants Jonathan Case (The Creep)! Eat your fill-before this comic eats you!

Thanks goes to Nahga for this release.
